name: Ekshef
description: Connecting People with Doctors in Egypt
overview:
Ekshef is trying to facilitate interaction between people and doctors in the middle east

Ekshef’s interactive directory allows users to search for doctors using several ways including name, specialty, place, price range, medical insurance and availability. The top results the user sees are doctors recommended by his/her friends on Facebook. The user can also know the doctor’s rating, read reviews about the service & see what friends said about it. This allows the user to save time & effort in finding the right doctor, and get all related information before visiting the clinic.

On the other side, doctors are welcomed to upload their specialties and clinics details to the website to start being recommended by people. Ekshef provides details for various specialties varying from internal medicine, dental, physiotherapy, Eyes, Orthopedics, ENT, gynecology, obstetrics and many other important specialties Egyptian citizens need to gain access to.

offices.address1: Smart Village, Kilo 28 Cairo-Alex desert road, Building #B5 Office #129-A
